description: Homelands Holdings (Private) Limited Vs W.A. Prasanna Buddhika and others before Hon. Prasantha De Silva J.
parties: Homelands Holdings (Private) Limited Vs W.A. Prasanna Buddhika and others
keywords: Forcible Dispossession- Lapse of 2 months- Revisionary Jurisdiction- Writ to Restore Possession- Intention of Primary Courts’ Procedure Act.
